title: Chinese Journalist Who Reported From Wuhan Is Gravely Ill After Prison Hunger Strike
sub_head: Washington calls for Beijing to release Zhang Zhan, while her family tries to persuade her to accept some food, but to no avail
body:
TAIPEIâ€”A woman who was imprisoned in China over her video reports from Wuhan during the early days of the pandemic is gravely ill after going on hunger strike, according to her family and attorney.
Zhang Zhan, 38 years old, who was initially detained in May 2020, can barely walk or hold up her head, according to her older brother, Zhang Ju. The U.S. government has called for her immediate release.
